summary: A spaceship returns to Earth after several years of space exploration and finds it desolate. Landing in what they believe is Mexico, the crew decides to travel north, and try to find out ... See full summary »
cast: Horst Frank|Dieter Laser|Jürgen Prochnow|Uwe Friedrichsen|Claus Theo Gärtner|Vicky Roskilly|Wolf Mittler
title: Operación Ganímedes
